title: Appointed providers to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities Dynamic Purchasing System

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Our query relates to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS. Could you please confirm:
a) The number of providers that have been appointed to the DPS;
b) The names of all providers that have been appointed to the DPS.
Yours faithfully,
Joe Ashwood

Dear Joe Ashwood,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Appointed providers
to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities
Dynamic Purchasing System which we received on 29/08/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 26/09/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: Tender Tracker <[FOI #1168452 email]>
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 11:38 AM
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Appointed providers to the
Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities Dynamic
Purchasing System
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Our query relates to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities
in Communities DPS. Could you please confirm:
a) The number of providers that have been appointed to the DPS;
b) The names of all providers that have been appointed to the DPS.
c) The number of Call-Off Competitions conducted via the Adult Learning
and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its launch;
d) The total, combined value of all Call-Off Competitions conducted via
the Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its
launch
Yours faithfully,
Joe Ashwood
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[2][FOI #1168452 email]

Copy of Skills Training and Employability Providers on the DPS for FOI.xlsx
18K
Download
View as HTML
Dear Joe Ashwood,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Appointed providers
to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities
Dynamic Purchasing System which we received on 29/08/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
a) The number of providers that have been appointed to the DPS - See
attached .xls
b) The names of all providers that have been appointed to the DPS – See
attached .xls
c) The number of Call-Off Competitions conducted via the Adult Learning
and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its launch – 16
d) The total, combined value of all Call-Off Competitions conducted via
the Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its
launch - £498,190
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
